comment._content: As it says in the top left corner 'TRIPLICATE (To be given to declarant)' this is Albert Einstein's own copy.

comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: This has a 'Production date' and hence Flickr 'date taken' of 1 October 1940. Shouldn't it be 15 January 1936?
